plot: As a man quietly contemplates his collection of caged birds and recognises the imbalance in feelings between him for them and them for him, a parallel is drawn between his hobby and the general nature of human relationships.
title: Cages
plot_es: As a man quietly contemplates his collection of caged birds and recognises the imbalance in feelings between him for them and them for him, a parallel is drawn between his hobby and the general nature of human relationships.
plot_en: As a man quietly contemplates his collection of caged birds and recognises the imbalance in feelings between him for them and them for him, a parallel is drawn between his hobby and the general nature of human relationships.
